data.name: CutsceneNoWayKiddo
data.value: Kiddo, [pause=20]this stuff is not for sale, [pause=20]if it were, [pause=15]it'd cost around [color=#75f6ff]10,000\uE024[color].

data.name: CutsceneInsertCharacter
data.value: \uE040: Hey, [pause=15]Kecleon Duo!

data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: Hey there, [pause=10]what are you in the market for?

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: Anything else I could help you with?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy Items

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell Items

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: If you see anything you like, [pause=10]just let me know. \n(Use {0} to select more than one Item.)

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: Sorry, [pause=10]I'm completely sold out... [pause=20]Come back tomorrow when we've restocked, [pause=10]ok?

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: What'cha selling? [pause=0]I might just buy it. \n(Use {0} to select more than one item.)

data.name: Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: Kiddo, [pause=10]I can't buy if you're not selling anything.

data.name: Shop_Info_001
data.value: Now that's the first time someone tilted their head at a store...

data.name: Shop_Info_002
data.value: Basically, [pause=10]I sell and buy common items for everyday use in dungeon exploration.

data.name: Shop_Info_003
data.value: If you want Wonder Orbs, [pause=10]TMs, [pause=10]or any of that magic stuff, [pause=10]visit my brother.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: Bye now, [pause=10]have a good day!

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: You're gonna have to empty that bag before you buy these wares.

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: ...What? [pause=0]You think I'm just gonna give it to you for less? [pause=0]No way.

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: With only that, it'll cost you {0}.

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: All of those things will come up to a total of {0}.

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: Nice doing business with you!

data.name: Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I can give you {0} for that.

data.name: Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: With all that stuff you've placed on the counter, I can give you {0}.

data.name: Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: Pleasure doing business with ya'!

data.name: Storage_Menu_Store
data.value: Deposit Items

data.name: Storage_Menu_Take
data.value: Withdraw Items

data.name: Storage_Menu_All
data.value: Deposit Everything

data.name: Storage_Menu_Stop
data.value: Exit

data.name: Storage_Menu_Dialogue
data.value: What would you like to do here, [pause=10]hun?

data.name: Storage_Menu_Confirm
data.value: Are you certain you want to store everything in your [color=#32a852]Treasure Bag[color]?

data.name: Storage_Menu_Confirmed
data.value: Don't worry yourself any, [pause=10]I'll have this stored away nice and neat for you, [pause=10]hun.

data.name: Appraisal_Intro
data.value: Your presence is felt here at my appraisal shop. [pause=0]What is your desire?

data.name: Appraisal_Return
data.value: Do you require extra assistance?

data.name: Appraisal_Option_Open
data.value: Open a Treasure Box

data.name: Appraisal_Choose
data.value: You are handing me something? [pause=0]A reminder, [pause=10][color=#32a852]Treasure Boxes[color] only. (Use {0} to select more than one box.)

data.name: Appraisal_Bag_Empty
data.value: I cannot appraise anything when you have nothing for me.

data.name: Appraisal_Info_001
data.value: You tilt your head to obtain my role? [pause=0]Very well.

data.name: Appraisal_Info_002
data.value: When explorers visit some dungeons, [pause=10]they obtain [color=#32a852]Treasure Boxes[color].

data.name: Appraisal_Info_003
data.value: For a fee, [pause=10]I will negate the lock that binds the box closed, [pause=10]and they obtain the item inside.

data.name: Appraisal_Goodbye
data.value: Until next time, [pause=10]explorer of dungeons.

data.name: Appraisal_No_Money
data.value: You seem to lack the fee I have assigned for my services. [pause=0]Keep the box.

data.name: Appraisal_Choose_One
data.value: Only the one, [pause=10]correct? [pause=10]It will require {0} to unshackle it's lock.

data.name: Appraisal_Choose_Multi
data.value: To open all of the boxes you have given me, [pause=10]it'll cost you \uE024{0}.

data.name: Appraisal_Start
data.value: The time is now, [pause=10]I will begin to do my work.

data.name: Storage_Menu_Storing
data.value: What would you like me to take care of, [pause=10]dear? \n(Use {0} to select more than one item.)

data.name: Storage_Menu_Taking
data.value: What would you like to take out? \n(Use {0} to select more than one item.)

data.name: Shop_Purple_Info1
data.value: Not the first time I was asked what I did.

data.name: Shop_Purple_Info2
data.value: I sell the more interesting wares for explorers. [pause=0]Things like wands, [pause=10]orbs, [pause=10]TMs, [pause=10]I can provide it all.

data.name: Shop_Purple_Info3
data.value: If you need the real basic stuff, [pause=10]my brother can provide those things.

data.name: Storage_Menu_Return
data.value: Need anything else, [pause=10]dear?
